'''Jefferson Hall''' is an actor. He recently appeared in the BBC's latest adaptation of ''[[wikipedia:Emma (2009 TV serial)|Emma]]''. Currently, he plays main character Torstein in History Channel's ''Vikings''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he played Ser [[Hugh of the Vale]]. He was announced in the role on 16 July 2010.
